casebody.data:
Marianne OLSON
v.
Fusaini MOHAMMADU Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 20, 2016

John F. Morris, in support of the petition.

Brandon B. Fontaine, in opposition

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn.App. 243, 149 A.3d 198 (2016), is denied.

ESPINOSA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
